column4: i can't connect using my DSL modem, can anyone assist? i've been told it should "just connect"
does you interface show with sudo ifconfig?
open a terminal. type sudo ifconfig at the prompt
so open a terminal, sudo ifconfig....then what comes next? anycommands afterwards?
tell me if the command shows your network interface
it Rx'd no packets, but Tx'd 12 with no errors..interesting i tried to pring some websites, and got "host name not found"
you haven't told me if sudo ifconfig shows your interface
pwnt! i need to check that
should it show the name of my NIC?
is it wifi or ethernet or what?
well just tell me the output of 'sudo ifconfig'
